After making videos about old media formats like LaserDisc and DVHS, we came to the natural conclusion that we had to watch one movie across as many formats as we could get our hands on. Fortunately for us, one of the few movies available on everything from Betamax to 4K Blu-ray is the one and only Rambo: First Blood.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1627374-i-watched-rambo-10-different-ways/
